txt.en:
'There can be only one reason for the muster of the Ox-clan... they plan to wage war upon Rohan, or to at least show their support for their countrymen's war. I would have you show them that such a demonstration of solidarity is futile.

'Enter Rhuvel-cadlus below us and confront the Uch-l没th... teach them -- with sword, if need be -- that to attack the Riddermark would be insanity at best.

'What say you, [placeholder]?'
'That should teach the wild men a lesson they won't soon forget! Ha!'
'The Ox-clan must be taught that merchants have no business in warfare.'
A company of Ox-clan warriors are encamped on the western edge of the Gravenwood, arrayed for war.
Uch-l没th can be found at Rhuvel-cadlus, in the valley below Cuthric's post.\n\nCuthric asked you to defeat Ox-clan warriors to dissuade them from warring upon Rohan.
Cuthric is hiding on the ridge above Rhuvel-cadlus.\n\nYou should return to Cuthric with news of your victory.
